A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I signed up just to review this movie. I have loved the Star Wars saga for years but was terribly disappointed in this movie. By far the worst Star Wars movie. The plot is an absurd contrivance. The characters show no development and their decisions are confusing at best and just stupid at worst. The treatment of Luke Skywalker was the worst part with him have no character continuity with the Luke we've watched grow and develop in the original trilogy. There are some nice visuals in this movie but it has no substance and the plot holes are to large to ignore. The flying Leia scene was another misstep. Just terrible.
